sentence.Network_en: The stars hazed over as a large cloud covered the night sky.
sentence.Network_cn: 一大片云遮住了夜空,这时星星变得朦胧起来.

sentence.Network_en: Not a cloud covered the blue heaven.
sentence.Network_cn: 蔚蓝的天空中没有一片云.

sentence.Network_en: Ex 24:15 And Moses went up into the mount and a cloud covered the mount.
sentence.Network_cn: 出24:15摩西上山,有云彩把山遮盖.出24:15摩西上山,有云彩把山遮盖.
